# Techco.lab - NETZSCH Digital Innovation Hub

> Techco.lab is the digital innovation hub of NETZSCH Group, building industrial AI solutions, connected platforms, and digital experiences that transform manufacturing operations across 50+ countries.

## About Techco.lab

Techco.lab is NETZSCH's technology development hub headquartered in Southern Brazil (Curitiba and Pomerode). We build digital products and intelligent technologies that power NETZSCH's global digital transformation.

### What We Build

- **Industrial AI**: AI systems that help factories predict problems, optimize processes, and reduce downtime
- **Connected Platforms**: Systems connecting equipment, data, and teams for real-time visibility
- **Digital Interfaces**: Intuitive interfaces for managers, technicians, and operators
- **Predictive Analytics**: AI-powered insights for maintenance and production optimization

### Our Capabilities

- Digital Strategy & Consulting
- Software Development (Cloud, APIs, Microservices)
- Data & AI Solutions (Analytics, ML, Automation)
- Experience & Design (UX/UI, Design Systems)

## Careers at Techco.lab

We hire technology professionals in hybrid work model in Southern Brazil:

### Benefits
- CLT Contract (Brazilian labor law)
- Profit Sharing (PPL)
- Health & Dental Insurance
- Wellness Platform (GoGood)
- Education Subsidy
- OpenEnglish Access
- NOA & Alura Learning Platforms
- Hybrid Work (flexible schedule)
- Food Voucher
- Referral Bonus

### Locations
- **Curitiba, PR**: Nex Coworking - Collaborative tech environment
- **Pomerode, SC**: NEM Headquarters - Engineering excellence hub

### Open Positions
View current openings: https://ntechcolab.com/open-positions
